Thoughts.thought: The most important thing in world is self belief.
Thoughts.author: Chetan Bhagat

Thoughts.thought: Money is the one thing which unites divides the people
Thoughts.author: Sudha Murthy

Thoughts.thought: Patience is the real truth of hardworking success
Thoughts.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Thoughts.thought: I have been struck again and again by my lessons.
Thoughts.author: Bill Gates

Thoughts.thought: I choose experienced people over new comers
Thoughts.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

Thoughts.thought: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out
Thoughts.author: Steve Jobs
